Articles.Content: Yes, doodke-1 is a comet.. with a twist. I created your usual asteroid grabber (like the one here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9fvjKVuULQ ) and I had 1 interstellar comet name doodke-1, and eventually those comets leave the orbit rendering border (hah that's REALLY far away!!) and so I had an idea: "What if i used cheats to doodke-1 into a failed to be created dwarf? planet?! So, i slapped together a asteroid grabber and used cheats to teleport to doodke-1 and try to slow down doodke-1 enough to put it back into the rendered solar system... that didn't work AT ALL! So, I used cheats! Now, it looks like doodke-1 was a failed-to-be-formed planet! I forgot to snap a pic so I will do that next time I'm on ksp. Any thoughts? Thanks!
Thread moved to Mission Reports, since it's not about real space flight.
